verses.verse: וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> sent חִירָ֨ם <WH2438> And Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king צ֤וֹר <WH6865> of Tyre אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> his servants אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> unto Solomon כִּ֣י <WH3588> when שָׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> for he had heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> when אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> מָשְׁח֥וּ <WH4886> that they had anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> him king תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> place אָבִ֑יהוּ <WH1> in the room of his father כִּ֣י <WH3588> when אֹהֵ֗ב <WH157> a lover הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> had חִירָ֛ם <WH2438> for Hiram לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> was ever ס
וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֶל־ <WH413> to חִירָ֖ם <WH2438> to Hiram לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> You יָדַ֜עְתָּ <WH3045> Thou knowest אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> how that David אָבִ֗י <WH1> my father כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָכֹל֙ <WH3201> could לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> not build בַּ֗יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁם֙ <WH8034> unto the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> his God מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> for הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> the wars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which סְבָבֻ֑הוּ <WH5437> which were about him on every side עַ֤ד <WH5704> until תֵּת־ <WH5414> put יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> until the LORD אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כַּפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> them under the soles [רַגְלֹו כ] (רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> be able to endure ק)

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now הֵנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> hath given me rest יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> But now the LORD אֱלֹהַ֛י <WH430> my God לִ֖י מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> on every side אֵ֣ין <WH369> there שָׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> [so that there is] neither adversary וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> is neither פֶּ֥גַע <WH6294> occurrent רָֽע׃ <WH7451> nor evil

וְהִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold אֹמֵ֔ר <WH559> And behold I purpose לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> unto the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> whom דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> unto David אָבִי֙ <WH1> my father לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בִּנְךָ֗ <WH1121> Thy son אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom אֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> whom I will set תַּחְתֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH8478> your place עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְאֶ֔ךָ <WH3678> upon thy throne הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> in thy room he shall build הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> unto my name

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now צַוֵּה֩ <WH6680> Now therefore command וְיִכְרְתוּ־ <WH3772> thou that they hew לִ֨י אֲרָזִ֜ים <WH730> me cedar trees מִן־ <WH4480> from הַלְּבָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> out of Lebanon וַֽעֲבָדַי֙ <WH5650> and my servants יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> will be with עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> shall be with thy servants וּשְׂכַ֤ר <WH7939> hire עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> for thy servants אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and unto thee will I give לְךָ֔ כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תֹּאמֵ֑ר <WH559> according to all that thou shalt appoint כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> for thou knowest כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֵ֥ין <WH369> there בָּ֛נוּ אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> that [there is] not among us any יֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> that can skill לִכְרָת־ <WH3772> to hew עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> timber כַּצִּדֹנִֽים׃ <WH6722> like unto the Sidonians

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֧עַ <WH8085> heard חִירָ֛ם <WH2438> And it came to pass when Hiram אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> of Solomon וַיִּשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> that he rejoiced מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> greatly וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] the LORD הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> which hath given לְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> unto David בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son חָכָ֔ם <WH2450> a wise עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> people הָרָ֖ב <WH7227> over this great הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent חִירָם֙ <WH2438> And Hiram אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> to Solomon לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שָׁמַ֕עְתִּי <WH8085> I have considered אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁלַ֖חְתָּ <WH7971> the things which thou sentest אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> to me for [and] I will do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner חֶפְצְךָ֔ <WH2656> all thy desire בַּעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> concerning timber אֲרָזִ֖ים <WH730> of cedar וּבַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> and concerning timber בְרוֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH1265> of fir

עֲ֠בָדַי <WH5650> My servants יֹרִ֨דוּ <WH3381> shall bring [them] down מִן־ <WH4480> from הַלְּבָנ֜וֹן <WH3844> from Lebanon יָ֗מָּה <WH3220> unto the sea וַ֠אֲנִי <WH589> and I אֲשִׂימֵ֨ם <WH7760> and I will convey דֹּבְר֤וֹת <WH1702> in floats בַּיָּם֙ <WH3220> them by sea עַֽד־ <WH5704> against הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where תִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> that thou shalt appoint אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about וְנִפַּצְתִּ֥ים <WH5310> me and will cause them to be discharged שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you תִשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> there and thou shalt receive וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> [them] and thou shalt accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> חֶפְצִ֔י <WH2656> my desire לָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> in giving לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> food בֵּיתִֽי׃ <WH1004> for my household

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become חִיר֜וֹם <WH2438> So Hiram נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> gave לִשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Solomon עֲצֵ֧י <WH6086> trees אֲרָזִ֛ים <WH730> cedar וַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> trees בְרוֹשִׁ֖ים <WH1265> and fir כָּל־ <WH3605> much חֶפְצֽוֹ׃ <WH2656> [according to] all his desire

וּשְׁלֹמֹה֩ <WH8010> And Solomon נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> gave לְחִירָ֜ם <WH2438> Hiram עֶשְׂרִים֩ <WH6242> twenty אֶ֨לֶף <WH505> thousand כֹּ֤ר <WH3734> measures חִטִּים֙ <WH2406> of wheat מַכֹּ֣לֶת <WH4361> [for] food לְבֵית֔וֹ <WH1004> to his household וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty כֹּ֖ר <WH3734> measures שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil כָּתִ֑ית <WH3795> of pure כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> thus gave שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Solomon לְחִירָ֖ם <WH2438> to Hiram שָׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year בְשָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> by year פ

וַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> gave חָכְמָה֙ <WH2451> wisdom לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> as he promised ל֑וֹ וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> and there was שָׁלֹ֗ם <WH7965> him and there was peace בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between חִירָם֙ <WH2438> between Hiram וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> and Solomon וַיִּכְרְת֥וּ <WH3772> made בְרִ֖ית <WH1285> a league שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> together

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> raised הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Solomon מַ֖ס <WH4522> a levy מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> out of all Israel וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become הַמַּ֔ס <WH4522> and the levy שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> was thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <WH7971> And he sent לְבָנ֗וֹנָה <WH3844> them to Lebanon עֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <WH505> thousand בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> a month חֲלִיפ֔וֹת <WH2487> by courses חֹ֚דֶשׁ <WH2320> a month יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> were in בַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> they were in Lebanon שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> [and] two חֳדָשִׁ֖ים <WH2320> months בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> at home וַאֲדֹנִירָ֖ם <WH141> and Adoniram עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמַּֽס׃ <WH4522> [was] over the levy ס

וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> become לִשְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> And Solomon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> had threescore and ten אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> that bare סַבָּ֑ל <WH5449> burdens וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand חֹצֵ֥ב <WH2672> hewers בָּהָֽר׃ <WH2022> in the mountains

לְ֠בַד <WH905> alone מִשָּׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> Beside the chief הַנִּצָּבִ֤ים <WH5324> officers לִשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> of Solomon's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> which [were] over the work שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred הָרֹדִ֣ים <WH7287> which ruled בָּעָ֔ם <WH5971> over the people הָעֹשִׂ֖ים <WH6213> that wrought בַּמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> in the work

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וַיַּסִּעוּ֩ <WH5265> and they brought אֲבָנִ֨ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֜וֹת <WH1419> great אֲבָנִ֧ים <WH68> stones יְקָר֛וֹת <WH3368> costly לְיַסֵּ֥ד <WH3245> to lay the foundation הַבָּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house אַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> stones גָזִֽית׃ <WH1496> [and] hewed

וַֽיִּפְסְל֞וּ <WH6458> did hew בֹּנֵ֧י <WH1129> builders שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> And Solomon's וּבֹנֵ֥י <WH1129> builders חִיר֖וֹם <WH2438> and Hiram's וְהַגִּבְלִ֑ים <WH1382> [them] and the stonesquarers וַיָּכִ֛ינוּ <WH3559> so they prepared הָעֵצִ֥ים <WH6086> timber וְהָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> and stones לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> to build הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house פ
